MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA3 Croft area of Warrington affecting properties in Gosling Road, Eaves Brow Road, Wadeson Way and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable on Eaves Brow Road and our team are working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:18pm on 26th January 2021.
